segments.text: Why are you walking to and fro in the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m worrying about the children . After all this is the first time they have been out without us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . They are grown-ups .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . But I couldn ’ t help .
segments.speaker: S2
